## TinySynq.reformatQueryValues() method

Renames keys of a query's value object to make them compatible with the SQLiteWASM API's bind parameters.

**Signature:**

```typescript
reformatQueryValues({ values, prefix }: {
        values: any;
        prefix?: string;
    }): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { values, prefix } | { values: any; prefix?: string; } |  |

**Returns:**

any
